postSuccessAddAlert.heading: Hey, it's all done!
postSuccessAddAlert.text: Your post has been added. You can see it in your article list. Keep posting!

postSuccessEditAlert.heading: Hey, it's all done!
postSuccessEditAlert.text: Your post has been changed. You can see the changes here.

postSuccessRegisterAlert.heading: You have successfully registered to the application.
postSuccessRegisterAlert.text: Thank you and go to login page.

differentPasswordsMessage.text: The entered passwords do not match.

wrongNumberOfLettersInUsernameMessage.text: Wrong number of letters. Your nickname should have at least 5 and no more than 50 characters.

wrongNumberOfLettersInPasswordMessage.text: Wrong number of letters. Your password should have at least 8 characters.

notAllInputFiledMessage.text: You need to fill all input boxes.

spaceInStringMessage.text: Not username nor password should contain space character.
